overview:
Tom Critser is VP of Sales and Alliances at FlashSoft.

Tom has twenty years of experience launching and growing enterprise software companies and managing large direct and reseller channels. Tom was previously VP of World Wide Sales at Infravio, the premier SOA management software company acquired by Software AG (webMethods). Before joining Infravio, Tom was a founding partner and VP of Sales at TriStep Systems, the first hosted consultant management and procurement software company, later acquired by eWork. Most recently Tom was VP of Sales and Business Development at RNA, the Memory Virtualization Software company. RNA provides data center software allowing customers to create virtual memory resources across commodity servers.
